product_name: Giro Espada Road Bike Shoes - Women's
long_description: The Giro Espada women's road bike shoes deliver road-ready performance thanks to a stiff carbon fiber platform and a luxurious, women-specific fit for long-lasting comfort. Lightweight synthetic leather and nylon mesh uppers give a glovelike fit with excellent breathability. Molded EVA footbeds include a fit kit with 3 different-size arch supports, allowing you to choose the amount of support needed. AEGIS Microbe Shield(R) antimicrobial treatment helps deter odors. Carbon fiber outsoles offer more rigidity than a nylon sole, providing a direct connection with the pedal and solid power transfer. Strong and secure ratcheting buckle allows precise on-the-fly adjustability; buckle is replaceable. 2 rip-and-stick closure straps provide a solid, secure fit over insteps and are offset to maximize comfort and minimize pressure points. Giro Espada road bike shoes are compatible with 3-bolt cleats; please note that cleats are not included (cleats typically come with pedals).
